EmailTemplate.subject: Your message didn't reach us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Quick reminder that as of mid January 2018 nest@orderbird.com is no longer supported!
With the restructure of NEST into CDS we revised and stream-lined our process of handling requests from colleagues. A small downside: we no longer process email requests here.
Instead we have a simplified ticketing system with only two ticket types that are valid for all our systems:
1. Incidences: Something doesn’t do what it is supposed to do and needs quick fixing 2. Story: Some new function or feature in one of our systems is required
To conveniently create one of those just click “Report Incident” or “Submit Story” on https://wiki.orderbird.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=14850879 (Bookmark this page!)
Thanks and best regards,
your CDS-Team
